duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and manage content for all social media platforms, including LinkedIn, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, and Google+
Conduct client selections meetings and record all build selections
Field inbound calls, record preliminary information, and set appointments
Process permits for all active builds and turn over to field production team
Assemble DocuSign contracting packages for clients committed to purchase
Process client change orders as needed and communicate required changes to field team
Participate in warranty management items and communicate to the client
Maintain minimal model home office hours to make new home sales and demonstrate product features, design, and the company's unique selling points
Track prospective sales within CRM system for efficient follow-up and reporting purposes
Complete other projects and tasks as assigned

education_certification.credential: Associates degree or 2-year training or education equivalent (preferred)
At least 1 year of relationship-driven business to consumer sales, preferably at one employer (preferred)
